resources.string: Need help with logging in? Click Here.
If you are having problems accessing the application:
Are you entering the correct details (username and password)? Students have both a \'Student ID Number\' and a \'Network Account\' username, as well as two passwords.
Have you forgotten your password or has your password expired? You can reset your password, provided you have registered with the online password portal service.
If you are still having difficulties, get in touch with the Brunel computing support team.
